attributes.additional_details:
Ron Dennis is one of our greatest British entrepreneurs, having built the McLaren F1 race team into a World leading brand with many successful other McLaren brands in the group.
McLaren F1 team have won 8 Constructors titles and 12 Drivers World Championships, they continue to be prestigious ambassadors representing the UK around the world.
Ron Dennis has now created a car manufacturing plant at Woking producing desirable sports cars with British labour, British components and British know how.
His achievements are endless and the company he has built up form virtually nothing, now employs many hundreds of people, he is an inspiration to many, has been awarded some of the highest honours from various engineering institutes around the world.
It is time for the Government of the UK to recognise Ron's fantastic lifetime achievements and award him a Knighthood, if you agree, support this petition please.
